description: This file defines a custom Flutter widget called PrimaryButton, which renders a styled elevated button with configurable label, color, height, and press callback.

classes.name: PrimaryButton
classes.description: A customizable button widget that displays a label and executes an optional callback when pressed.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the PrimaryButton, returning a SizedBox containing an ElevatedButton styled with provided parameters.
